document.discussion_title: Backstreet Boys, NSYNC founder Lou Pearlman dies
document.topic_text: *Los Angeles:* Lou Pearlman, the producer responsible for boy bands Backstreet Boys and NSYNC, died in prison while serving his 25-year sentence for a USD 300 million Ponzi scheme.
